from important things to consider before you begin… i have tried very hard to make all of my clothing patterns as versatile as possible in theory as long as you use the same type of yarn e g acrylic cotton etc the same brand of yarn the same weight of yarn and the same hook size the clothing should fit your dolls however some people have commented that they have a tendency to stuff their dolls
